text: Gerardo Vera Perales (10 March 194720 September 2020) was a Spanish costume and set designer, opera director, actor, and movie and theatre director. He was born in Madrid. Vera was known for his works in La Celestina (1994) and in Second Skin (2000). He won a Goya Award in 1986.
